item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Hi kwigyo, I don't know much about your situation but I hope that I can give you helpful advice.
First of all, don't get the rides awesome just for that purpose, you don't need it. Don't worry about upgrading your gear apart from Digital Keychain, which is essential and a great thing to prioritise, not to mention that it is the only way to get rid of your Grind Core (-1 success) aside from looping.
[Subsection about Digi keychain: Its main costs are Soundless Jade -a medium difficulty untradable LW- and 20 Lightning Essences. On the previous upgrades in the chain you must have used 4 Sapphire Ryo coins and 3 Ruby Ryo coins, both available even on Normal rides. It also gives you more rides, which means more tips and coins! If you do not have the coins for this upgrade (or rather the preceding levels), you may want to try doing very well at normal rides as jimfromtx suggested. Which brings me onto my next point…]

LuLu. Perhaps Evil Taxi's biggest advantage is that you can equip two passangers, so throw on White Witch and LuLu for +50 deliciousness. He is available in the Midnight Run packs which Hard unlocks.
Regarding Work in the Back, it's awful. It really is not very good, it gives you less tips and problably less coins than you can earn. You have to spend a few cards to get tips and coins, crack a few eggs to make an omelette, don't let that part put you off. However, if you can't get above 100 deliciousness, then 10% is at least better than none. But again, in this case it would probably be better to go back to normal if you're that desperate for ruby/sapphies. The other gear upgrades won't really help your deliciousness much anyway.

Now for the personal advice from what I can, from the outside, try to deduce… You're season 4, you have all 4 tradable lost weapons, however you are not R00t rank and never have been, as such you have not been able to claim your lycoris. You do not have pink taser or time reversal cube. In fact, even before One Sin stages, you do not have Epitaph of the Twilight, so I believe you are having some difficulty beating the discords.
For these reasons you cannot get a Soundless Jade any time soon and thus cannot progress any further in your PizzaWitch progress… after hard comes the extremely boring Cans of Sauce grind, which does not loop, followed by the Digi Keychain check. I know it is not what you asked but at this point I can only recommend you loop to S15+ and get this far into r00t that you can make the digital keychain, simultaneously running Hard/Normal rides since they cost no stamina and are free daily. By then you should have a good stock of Midnight Run cards and enough tips saved up to buy the Mach Eleven and a few levels too…

tl;dr (but I took all that time to see what you needed…), don't do shifts unless 1. You have no good cards, or 2. You can't even get 100 Deliciousness, or 3. You have no time. Don't restat into rides, they're useless (sometimes useful for WK or high-level coin grinding, but that's situational…). Get LuLu a.s.a.p. for free deliciousness bonus every ride. Consider doing normal rides if you only need sapphire/ruby.

Giving way too much detail as always,
-Prince
